name: Mystic Defend
description:
Description:

Mystic Defend is towers defend game my first game that I’ve created and its work in progress.

In this game you stop the enemy wave from reaching your base.

You get different types of tower at your disposals and as the enemy wave increase it becomes harder, you have different levels to beat and different enemies with their individual speed and health. We have a high score system can you make a new high score in a given period of time.

Key Features:

Varieties of Towers

Different types of Enemies

Sell button for towers

Wave with increasing difficulty

High score system

Release Date:

24th June 2014

Platform:

Windows OS

Price:

free to play

Contact Information:

maxwithx@hotmail.com

Personal Bio:

My name is Meiphullung Golmei (Max) currently studying Bachelors in Creative Technologies in Media Design School, Auckland, New Zealand. . This game was created as my first semester project for my course.
